description: Try our easy to follow Caramel Pecan Carrot Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caramel Pecan Carrot Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl; whisk caramel and hot water until smooth. Drizzle caramel over the tops of the frosted cupcakes. Sprinkle with 40g crushed pecans.
